page.title: 11FARMING INTERVIEW (CONT'D)
page.content: {A farmer in Yeo Vale (cont'd).} Seven men work here; self, son,two herdsmen, maintenance man, trainee on machinery, and retired worker coming two days a week. Owns six tractors and replaces one every other year - a major expense. Keeps good relations with neighbours, for example giving them notice before spraying. For the future, thinks small fields will stay without much further loss of hedges; already uses electric fencing to control grazing. Expects to continue on the present scale, but hopes to rear even better bulls.
